com.alee.utils
Class WebUtils

java.lang.Object
  com.alee.utils.WebUtils

public class WebUtils
extends java.lang.Object

This class provides a set of utilities to work with URLs and email addresses.

Since:
1.3
Author:
Mikle Garin
